mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sys_district WHERE parentDistrictId = 0 and deletedFlag = 0 ORDER BY createdTime DESC
SELECT * FROM t_sys_district WHERE parentDistrictId = 0 and deletedFlag = 0 and id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM t_sys_district WHERE parentDistrictId = #{parentId} and deletedFlag = 0 and id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM t_sys_district WHERE code = #{code} and deletedFlag = 0
SELECT * FROM t_sys_district WHERE deletedFlag = 0 ORDER BY createdTime DESC

SELECT tsd.id, tsd.code, tsd.fullName, tsd.shortName, tsd.districtTypeId, tsdt.name as districtTypeName, tsd.parentDistrictId, tsd.parentDistrictName, tsd.isoTwoAlphabetCode, tsd.isoThreeAlphabetCode, tsd.isoThreeNumericCode, tsd.serialNo, tsd.serialName, tsd.isoLanguageCode, tsd.isoLanguageName, tsd.phoneAreaCode, tsd.description, tsd.memo FROM t_sys_district as tsd LEFT JOIN t_sys_district_type as tsdt ON tsd.districtTypeId = tsdt.id WHERE parentDistrictId = #{parentDistrictId} and tsd.deletedFlag = 0 ORDER BY tsd.createdTime DESC
